title: Resolve Incorrect Item Shipped
description: A customer ordered a red shirt but received a blue one. The agent needs to fix the mistake.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's original order to confirm they ordered the red shirt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the original order was for the red shirt.

tasks.description: Apologize for the error and process a new, no-charge order for the correct red shirt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a replacement order for the correct item.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with a free return label to send back the incorrect blue shirt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a return label to the customer.
